entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
